title: Port number field is not used / ignored on web connections
author: skewty
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
When protocol is set to HTTP or HTTPS 
Hostname/IP field must not contain port number of server.
because port number is specified in Port field.

## Current Behavior
Port number specified in Port field is ignored. The port number must be embedded in Hostname/IP field.

## Possible Solution
- Remove `Port` number field and `Protocol` fields for Browser connections as the URI contains all the required information.

Version 1.77.2
